p: In 2005, Lin et al. studied phenolic compounds which were evaluated for their inhibitory effects on the SARS- CoV 3CL pro. Aloe-emodin ( 9) and hesperetin ( 10) dose-dependently inhibited cleavage activity of the 3CL pro in in vitro cell-free and cell-based assays, the IC 50 values of aloe-emodin ( 9) and hesperetin ( 10) were 132 μM and 60 μM, respectively [ 26].
